channel.title: Help with changing hp bar look
channel.description: i have pi with exion client i think and i was wondering if anybody knew how to change the hp bar. right now its the old squar how do i get the new bubble type hp bar? sorry if this is in wrtong section i saw a post directing somebody to the vlient hacking section

item.title: Help with changing hp bar look
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

k well i searched for it and only got stuff like in server delelpoment with new hp bars in ppls servers. and people asking questions about it but no answers:/ can anybody link me to a tut on this or do you know how to??
if not thats fine ill try browsing for a bit or try to figure it out.

Read full topic
